location: Oratory Church of St Wilfrid, York, North Yorkshire
footnotes: First quarter peal in a dress for all.  (Last?  Time will tell....)
Rung to prove that ringing in dresses is not as easy as it looks.  (Mixed consensus).
Rung in anticipation of NUA, and a welcome to everyone who is descending on York this weekend.

The band would like to associate William M Regan (friend) with this quarter peal.  Here in spirit but not in body.  The band would like to make clear that he did buy a dress for this occasion; he just failed to make use of it.....
